metadata.title: I think the RZ/N2L can support three ports for EtherCAT, but are there any specifications such as which communication ports to use for IN/OUT?

sections.content:
Question:
I think the RZ/N2L can support three ports for EtherCAT, but are there any specifications such as which communication ports to use for IN/OUT?
Answer:
Port 0 of the integrated EtherCAT controller is for IN, and the remaining ports are for OUT. Typically the ETH0 port of RZ/N2L corresponds to IN, but alternatively the ETH2 port of RZ/N2L may correspond to IN. The assignment is selected by the MODCTRL register.
